steps.name: gcr.io/google.com/cloudsdktool/cloud-sdk:latest
args:
_NAME_PREFIX=$(openssl rand -hex 12)
for _ORG in $(echo $${_GITHUB_ORGANISATIONS} | sed "s/,/ /g"); do
  gcloud tasks create-http-task "$${_NAME_PREFIX}_$${_ORG}_request" --queue=$${_CLOUD_TASKS_QUEUE} --url="https://europe-west1-${PROJECT_ID}.cloudfunctions.net/${PROJECT_ID}-backup-request-func" --header=Content-Type:application/json --body-content='{"organisation": "'$${_ORG}'"}' --oidc-service-account-email="${PROJECT_ID}@appspot.gserviceaccount.com" --project=${PROJECT_ID} --quiet
  gcloud tasks create-http-task "$${_NAME_PREFIX}_$${_ORG}_download" --queue=$${_CLOUD_TASKS_QUEUE} --schedule-time="$(date -d "1 hour" --utc "+%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")" --url="https://europe-west1-${PROJECT_ID}.cloudfunctions.net/${PROJECT_ID}-backup-download-func" --header=Content-Type:application/json --body-content='{"organisation": "'$${_ORG}'"}' --oidc-service-account-email="${PROJECT_ID}@appspot.gserviceaccount.com" --project=${PROJECT_ID} --quiet
done
